price: Wie willst du das auch aushalten, wovon du keine umfassende Kenntnis hast?
arabic: وَكَيۡفَ تَصۡبِرُ عَلَىٰ مَا لَمۡ تُحِطۡ بِهِۦ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: wakayfa taṣbiru ʿalā mā lam tuḥiṭ bihi khub'ran
